languages.text: "Немыслимо! Какой позор для Дома Орселлио! Мы настоятельно просим Вольного Торговца изменить приговор — что это, как не плевок в лицо {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}?!"

traits.locale_text: "Немыслимо! Какой позор для Дома Орселлио! Мы настоятельно просим Вольного Торговца изменить приговор — что это, как не плевок в лицо {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}?!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Unthinkable! It would be a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — how is this not a grave insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "Немыслимо! Какой позор для Дома Орселлио! Мы настоятельно просим Вольного Торговца изменить приговор — что это, как не плевок в лицо {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Навис Нобилите{/g}?!"

traits.locale_text: "Unthinkable! What a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — what is it if not a spit in the faces of {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Unthinkable! What a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — what is it if not a spit in the faces of {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Unthinkable! It would be a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — how is this not a grave insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Unthinkable! It would be a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — how is this not a grave insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

traits.locale_text: "Unthinkable! It would be a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — how is this not a grave insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “这简直是不可想象！这是在让奥赛罗家族蒙羞！我们恳请行商浪人重新考虑这个判决。这是对{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}的严重侮辱，不是吗？”
languages.original_text: "Unthinkable! It would be a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — how is this not a grave insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: “这简直是不可想象！这是在让奥塞罗家族蒙羞！我们恳请行商浪人重新考虑这个判决。这是对{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}导航宗族{/g}的严重侮辱，不是吗？”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «¡Inconcebible! ¡Sería una desgracia para la casa Orsellio! Comerciante Independiente, le ruego que recapacite... ¿no ve el grave insulto que supondría para la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?».
languages.original_text: "Unthinkable! It would be a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — how is this not a grave insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: «¡Inconcebible! ¡Sería una desgracia para la casa Orsellio! Comerciante Independiente, le ruego que recapacite... ¿no ve el grave insulto que supondría para la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「あり得ぬ！オーセリオ家の恥だ！我々は自由開拓者に対し、判決を再考するよう強く求める…これは{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}に対する重大な侮辱ではないか？」
languages.original_text: "Unthinkable! It would be a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — how is this not a grave insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: 「あり得ぬ！オーセリオ家の恥だ！我々は自由開拓者に対し、判決を再考するよう強く求める…これは{g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}航宙貴族{/g}に対する重大な侮辱ではないか？」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Undenkbar! Das wäre eine Schande für das Haus Orsellio! Wir bitten {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dringend, die Strafe zu überdenken – wäre sie nicht eine schwere Beleidigung der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "Unthinkable! It would be a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — how is this not a grave insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Undenkbar! Das wäre eine Schande für das Haus Orsellio! Wir bitten {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} dringend, die Strafe zu überdenken – wäre sie nicht eine schwere Beleidigung der {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « C'est impensable, voyons ! Ce serait une humiliation pour la maison Orsellio ! Nous supplions {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de bien vouloir reconsidérer la question. Ne serait-ce pas une terrible insulte à la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} toute entière ? »
languages.original_text: "Unthinkable! It would be a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — how is this not a grave insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est impensable, voyons ! Ce serait une humiliation pour la maison Orsellio ! Nous supplions {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} de bien vouloir reconsidérer la question. Ne serait-ce pas une terrible insulte à la {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g} toute entière ? »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "İmkânsız! Bu, Orsellio Hanesi'ni lekelemek anlamına gelir! Hür Tacir'in bu cezayı yeniden değerlendirmesini rica ederiz. Bu, {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite'ye{/g} ağır bir hakaret değildir de nedir?"
languages.original_text: "Unthinkable! It would be a disgrace for House Orsellio! We urge the Rogue Trader to reconsider the sentence — how is this not a grave insult to the {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Mümkünatsız! Bu Orsellio Hanesi'ni lekelemek anlamına gelir! Hür Tacir'in bu cezayı yeniden değerlendirmesini rica ederiz. Bu {g|Encyclopedia:NavisNobilite}Navis Nobilite{/g}'ye karşı yapılan ağır bir hakaret değildir de nedir?
traits.speaker: NaviLeader
